levelPack.packDescription: Join Ranger Leo on an exciting expedition through the wild jungle!

levels.title: Animal Homes
levels.miniStory: Ranger Leo needs help matching jungle animals to their homes.

puzzleData.instruction: Match each animal to its natural habitat!

levels.hint: Monkeys love to swing in trees!
levels.funFact: Monkeys use their tails like an extra hand!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Welcome! I'm Ranger Leo! Help me match animals to homes!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ Fantastic! You understand animal habitats!

levels.title: River Crossing
levels.miniStory: Cross the jungle river safely using stepping stones!
levels.hint: Use the stepping stones!
levels.funFact: Amazon River has over 3,000 species of fish!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Help me cross this river safely!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ Excellent! We made it across!

levels.title: Food Chain
levels.miniStory: Arrange the jungle food chain!
levels.hint: Start with plants!
levels.funFact: Food chains keep nature in balance!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Let's learn about the food chain!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ Perfect! You understand nature's balance!

levels.title: Animal Sounds
levels.miniStory: Match animals to their sounds!
levels.hint: Lions roar loudly!
levels.funFact: Howler monkeys are the loudest land animals!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Listen! Match each animal to its call!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ Amazing! You can identify animals by sound!

levels.title: Jungle Trail
levels.miniStory: Navigate through dense jungle!
levels.hint: Watch for thick vines!
levels.funFact: Elephants create natural jungle trails!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Let's explore deeper into the jungle!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ Great navigation skills!

levels.title: Camouflage Hunt
levels.miniStory: Match animals to their camouflage!
levels.hint: Animals blend with surroundings!
levels.funFact: Leaf-tailed gecko looks exactly like a dead leaf!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Find the hidden animals!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ Nothing can hide from you!

levels.title: Monkey Business
levels.miniStory: Help monkeys arrange by size!
levels.hint: Start with the smallest!
levels.funFact: Gorillas can be 6 feet tall!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Help organize the monkey troop!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ Perfect monkey knowledge!

levels.title: Waterfall Path
levels.miniStory: Navigate to the hidden waterfall!
levels.hint: Follow the sound of water!
levels.funFact: Angel Falls is the world's highest waterfall!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Let's find the secret waterfall!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ We found it! Beautiful!

levels.title: Bird Species
levels.miniStory: Match jungle birds to features!
levels.hint: Parrots are very colorful!
levels.funFact: Hummingbirds can fly backwards!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Learn about jungle birds!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You're a bird expert now!

levels.title: Jungle Layers
levels.miniStory: Arrange jungle layers from ground to sky!
levels.hint: Start from the ground!
levels.funFact: Most animals live in the canopy!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Learn about jungle structure!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You understand the jungle perfectly!

levels.title: Predator & Prey
levels.miniStory: Match predators to their prey!
levels.hint: Think about what each animal hunts!
levels.funFact: Jaguars are the strongest big cats!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Learn about predator-prey relationships!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You understand the hunt!

levels.title: Ancient Temple
levels.miniStory: Navigate to the ancient temple!
levels.hint: The temple is deep in the jungle!
levels.funFact: Many ancient temples are hidden in jungles!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Let's find the lost temple!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ We discovered it! Amazing!

levels.title: Insect World
levels.miniStory: Match insects to their roles!
levels.hint: Bees make delicious honey!
levels.funFact: Ants can carry 50 times their weight!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Discover the tiny jungle workers!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ Insects are amazing!

levels.title: Animal Life Cycle
levels.miniStory: Arrange butterfly life cycle!
levels.hint: Life starts with an egg!
levels.funFact: Butterflies taste with their feet!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Learn about metamorphosis!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You understand life cycles!

levels.title: Canopy Adventure
levels.miniStory: Swing through the treetops!
levels.hint: Swing from tree to tree!
levels.funFact: Canopy is home to 90% of jungle species!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Let's explore the treetops!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You're a canopy expert!

levels.title: Jungle Plants
levels.miniStory: Match plants to their uses!
levels.hint: Plants have many uses!
levels.funFact: 25% of medicines come from rainforest plants!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Learn about jungle plants!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You're a botanist now!

levels.title: Night Safari
levels.miniStory: Match nocturnal animals!
levels.hint: These animals are active at night!
levels.funFact: Owls can rotate their heads 270 degrees!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Explore the jungle at night!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You know the night creatures!

levels.title: Conservation Steps
levels.miniStory: Arrange conservation actions!
levels.hint: Start by learning!
levels.funFact: One tree can produce oxygen for 2 people!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Learn how to protect nature!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You're a conservation hero!

levels.title: Final Expedition
levels.miniStory: Complete the ultimate jungle journey!
levels.hint: Use all your jungle skills!
levels.funFact: You've become a true jungle explorer!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ This is our final challenge!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You did it! You're a master explorer!

levels.title: Jungle Master Challenge
levels.miniStory: Prove you're the ultimate Jungle Master!

puzzleData.instruction: Complete all phases to become Jungle Master!

levels.hint: Use everything you learned!
levels.funFact: You're now a guardian of the jungle!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Final test! Become Jungle Master!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ YOU DID IT! You're now Jungle Master! The jungle is proud of you!

levels.title: Rainforest Canopy
levels.miniStory: Climb to the treetops! The canopy is where most jungle animals live.

puzzleData.instruction: Match each canopy animal to what it does!

levels.hint: The canopy is like a highway in the sky for jungle animals!
levels.funFact: The canopy is home to 70-90% of all jungle life!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Let's climb to the treetops!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You've mastered the canopy level!

levels.title: Jungle Floor
levels.miniStory: Explore the dark forest floor where decomposers work their magic!
levels.hint: The forest floor is dark because the canopy blocks sunlight!
levels.funFact: Only 2% of sunlight reaches the jungle floor!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Watch your step on the jungle floor!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You navigated the dark floor perfectly!

levels.title: River Rapids
levels.miniStory: The jungle river is full of life! Learn about river animals.

puzzleData.instruction: Show how a jungle river forms!

levels.hint: Rivers start in mountains and flow to the ocean!
levels.funFact: The Amazon River has more water than the next 7 largest rivers combined!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Let's follow the river's journey!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You understand the river's path!

levels.title: Waterfall Cave
levels.miniStory: Behind the waterfall is a secret cave! Match animals that live near water.

puzzleData.instruction: Match each water animal to its trait!

levels.hint: Many dangerous animals live in jungle rivers!
levels.funFact: Bull sharks can swim in both salt and fresh water!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Careful near the water - it's full of surprises!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You know all the water creatures now!

levels.title: Monkey Kingdom
levels.miniStory: Meet the monkey troops! They have complex social lives.

puzzleData.instruction: Swing through the trees like a monkey!

levels.hint: Monkeys live in groups called troops and communicate with sounds!
levels.funFact: Howler monkeys can be heard 3 miles away!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Welcome to the monkey kingdom!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ The monkeys accept you as one of them!

levels.title: Gorilla Family
levels.miniStory: Meet the gentle giants! Gorillas are peaceful and intelligent.
levels.hint: Gorillas spend most of their day eating and resting!
levels.funFact: Gorillas share 98% of their DNA with humans!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Shh! Let's observe the gorilla family quietly!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You understand gorilla behavior now!

levels.title: Chimpanzee Tools
levels.miniStory: Chimps are super smart! They use tools just like humans.

puzzleData.instruction: Match each tool to how chimps use it!

levels.hint: Chimps are one of the few animals that use tools!
levels.funFact: Chimps can learn sign language and use over 300 signs!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Watch how smart these chimps are!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You've learned from the masters of tool use!

levels.title: Orangutan Nest
levels.miniStory: Orangutans build a new nest every night! Navigate to their sleeping spot.

puzzleData.instruction: Help the orangutan find the perfect tree for a nest!

levels.hint: Orangutans are the largest tree-dwelling animals!
levels.funFact: Orangutans build a new nest from branches every single night!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Let's help build a cozy nest!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ Perfect nest! The orangutan will sleep well!

levels.title: Lemur Leap
levels.miniStory: Lemurs are amazing jumpers! Learn about these unique primates.

puzzleData.instruction: Show how a lemur leaps between trees!

levels.hint: Lemurs can jump up to 25 feet between trees!
levels.funFact: Lemurs only live in Madagascar - nowhere else on Earth!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Watch these amazing acrobats!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You've mastered the lemur leap!

levels.title: Sloth Slow Motion
levels.miniStory: Sloths are the slowest mammals! Match their unique adaptations.

puzzleData.instruction: Match each sloth trait to why it's useful!

levels.hint: Sloths are slow because they save energy!
levels.funFact: Sloths only poop once a week and lose 30% of their body weight!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Let's learn about the slowest animal!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You understand why sloths are so chill!

levels.title: Jaguar Hunt
levels.miniStory: The jaguar is the jungle's top predator! Learn about this powerful hunter.
levels.hint: Jaguars are ambush predators with the strongest bite of any big cat!
levels.funFact: Jaguars can bite through turtle shells and even crocodile skulls!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Let's learn from the jungle's apex predator!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You understand the jaguar's hunting mastery!

levels.title: Puma Prowl
levels.miniStory: Pumas are stealthy mountain cats! Navigate through their territory.
levels.hint: Pumas can jump 18 feet high and 40 feet forward!
levels.funFact: Pumas have over 40 different names including cougar, mountain lion, and panther!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Shh! Let's track the silent puma!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You moved as silently as a puma!

levels.title: Ocelot Stealth
levels.miniStory: Ocelots are beautiful spotted cats! Match their hunting adaptations.

puzzleData.instruction: Match each ocelot feature to its use!

levels.hint: Ocelots are expert climbers and swimmers!
levels.funFact: Ocelots can rotate their ankles to climb down trees headfirst!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Meet the beautiful ocelot!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You know all about these spotted hunters!

levels.title: Anaconda River
levels.miniStory: The anaconda is the world's heaviest snake! Learn about this river giant.
levels.hint: Anacondas are constrictors - they squeeze their prey!
levels.funFact: Green anacondas can weigh over 500 pounds and grow 30 feet long!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Careful! The anaconda is a powerful predator!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You understand the anaconda's strength!

levels.title: Python Squeeze
levels.miniStory: Pythons are master constrictors! Navigate through python territory.

puzzleData.instruction: Slither through the jungle like a python!

levels.hint: Pythons can sense heat from warm-blooded animals!
levels.funFact: Reticulated pythons can grow over 20 feet and swallow deer whole!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Let's follow the python's path!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You moved like a python!

levels.title: Cobra Strike
levels.miniStory: King cobras are the longest venomous snakes! Match their deadly features.
levels.hint: King cobras can stand up to 6 feet tall!
levels.funFact: King cobras are the only snakes that build nests for their eggs!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Respect the king cobra - it's deadly but amazing!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You know all about the king of snakes!

levels.title: Viper Venom
levels.miniStory: Pit vipers have heat-sensing pits! Learn about these venomous hunters.

puzzleData.instruction: Show how a pit viper hunts!

levels.hint: Pit vipers can sense heat from warm-blooded animals in total darkness!
levels.funFact: Pit vipers can strike in 0.2 seconds - faster than you can blink!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ These snakes have a sixth sense!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You understand viper hunting technology!

levels.title: Tree Frog Colors
levels.miniStory: Poison dart frogs are the most colorful animals! Navigate through their territory.

puzzleData.instruction: Hop through the colorful frog habitat!

levels.hint: Bright colors warn predators that these frogs are poisonous!
levels.funFact: One golden poison dart frog has enough poison to kill 10 people!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Beautiful but deadly - don't touch!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You hopped through frog paradise!

levels.title: Poison Dart Frog
levels.miniStory: Learn why these tiny frogs are so poisonous! Match their survival strategies.
levels.hint: Poison dart frogs get their poison from the ants they eat!
levels.funFact: In captivity, poison dart frogs lose their poison because they don't eat toxic ants!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ These tiny frogs pack a deadly punch!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You're now a poison dart frog expert!

levels.title: Chameleon Change
levels.miniStory: Chameleons can change color! Learn about these amazing lizards.
levels.hint: Chameleons change color based on mood, temperature, and communication!
levels.funFact: Chameleons change color using special crystal cells in their skin!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Watch this amazing color-changing master!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ Incredible! You've mastered the jungle! You're a true Jungle Master!

levels.title: Toucan Beak
levels.miniStory: Toucans have huge colorful beaks! Learn why they're so big.

puzzleData.instruction: Match each beak feature to its purpose!

levels.hint: Toucan beaks are huge but surprisingly light!
levels.funFact: A toucan's beak can be one-third of its total body length!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Look at that amazing beak!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You understand toucan beaks now!

levels.title: Macaw Colors
levels.miniStory: Macaws are the most colorful parrots! Navigate through their rainbow world.
levels.hint: Macaws mate for life and can live 50+ years!
levels.funFact: Macaws eat clay from riverbanks to neutralize toxins in their food!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ These are the most beautiful birds in the jungle!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You flew with the macaws!

levels.title: Parrot Talk
levels.miniStory: Parrots can mimic human speech! Learn about their intelligence.

puzzleData.instruction: Show how parrots learn to talk!

levels.hint: Parrots don't just mimic - they can understand meanings!
levels.funFact: Alex the African Grey parrot had the intelligence of a 5-year-old child!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Let's learn how parrots talk!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You understand parrot intelligence!

levels.title: Harpy Eagle
levels.miniStory: The harpy eagle is the jungle's top aerial predator! Match hunting features.
levels.hint: Harpy eagles can snatch monkeys right out of trees!
levels.funFact: Harpy eagle talons are longer than grizzly bear claws!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ The harpy eagle is the king of the sky!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You know the jungle's top predator!

levels.title: Condor Flight
levels.miniStory: Condors soar on thermal currents! Navigate through the sky.

puzzleData.instruction: Soar like a condor on thermal currents!

levels.hint: Condors can fly for hours without flapping their wings!
levels.funFact: Andean condors have a 10-foot wingspan - the largest of any land bird!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Let's soar with the condors!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You flew like a condor!

levels.title: Hummingbird Speed
levels.miniStory: Hummingbirds are the fastest small birds! Match their amazing abilities.
levels.hint: Hummingbirds must eat every 10 minutes to survive!
levels.funFact: A hummingbird's heart beats 1,200 times per minute!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ These tiny birds are incredible!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You understand hummingbird superpowers!

levels.title: Butterfly Migration
levels.miniStory: Monarch butterflies migrate thousands of miles! Show their journey.
levels.hint: Monarch butterflies migrate up to 3,000 miles!
levels.funFact: No single butterfly completes the whole migration - it takes 4 generations!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ These delicate butterflies are tough travelers!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You followed the butterfly migration!

levels.title: Moth Camouflage
levels.miniStory: Moths are masters of disguise! Navigate through their camouflaged world.
levels.hint: Some moths look exactly like tree bark, leaves, or even bird droppings!
levels.funFact: The Atlas moth is so big it's often mistaken for a bird!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Can you spot the hidden moths?
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You found all the camouflaged moths!

levels.title: Beetle Armor
levels.miniStory: Beetles have the toughest exoskeletons! Match beetle defenses.
levels.hint: Beetles are the most diverse group of animals on Earth!
levels.funFact: Dung beetles can pull 1,141 times their own body weight!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Beetles are tiny tanks!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ You know all about beetle armor!

levels.title: Ant Colony
levels.miniStory: Ant colonies are like cities! Show how an ant colony works.

puzzleData.instruction: Show how an ant colony develops!

levels.hint: An ant colony can have millions of ants working together!
levels.funFact: Leafcutter ants farm fungus underground - they're farmers!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦ Ant colonies are amazing societies!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦ Incredible! You've truly mastered the jungle! You're the ultimate Jungle Master!
